summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3656 for the improvement of Latona Avenue, from East 50th Street to 2nd Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45083, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
